meanings.definition: A person or group that renovates something, especially a building or room.
meanings.sent1: The renovators worked tirelessly to transform the old house into a modern masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The team of renovators completed the renovation of the office building ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The renovators accidentally painted the door green instead of blue, adding a quirky touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: The renovators were like artists, turning the rundown apartment into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The renovators brought new life to the historic mansion with their skilled craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: The act of renovating or improving something.
meanings.sent1: The renovators of the kitchen installed brand new cabinets and countertops.
meanings.sent2: Renovators often face unexpected challenges during the renovation process.
meanings.sent3: The renovators decided to have a dance-off to determine who would lead the renovation project.
meanings.sent4: The renovation project was a rollercoaster of emotions for the renovators involved.
meanings.sent5: The renovators' dedication to quality showed in every detail of the renovated space.
